description: Try our easy to follow Easter Bunny Brownies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easter Bunny Brownies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut brownie into 12 even pieces. Spread tops with icing. Decorate with smarties for the bunny eyes and noses. Break KITKAT fingers in half and use to make bunny ears and arrange liquorice straps to make bunny's whiskers.
